options.description: output color to which darkest input color is mapped (default "black")
options.name: blackpt

options.description: output color to which brightest input color is mapped (default "white")
options.name: whitept

options.description: amount of temporal smoothing of the input range, to reduce flicker (from 0 to 2.68435e+08) (default 0)
options.name: smoothing

options.description: proportion of independent to linked channel normalization (from 0 to 1) (default 1)
options.name: independence

options.description: strength of filter, from no effect to full normalization (from 0 to 1) (default 1)
options.name: strength
